info.name: Pinkify! Google Docs
info.description: Pinkify! Google Docs I decided to make a simple cute theme for Google Docs to make it less tormenting on me while working on my thesis and such. Enjoy! INSTALLATION AND CUSTOMISATION INSTRUCTIONS Important! This theme is not very accessible! The contrast ratio is not suitable for those with sight problems. If there is demand, I might make a version that has better contrast rations while still looking cute. Support me on tumblr!
